basics.name: Arthur Brongniart
basics.label: Web developer
basics.summary: I do cool things on the web.

work.name: Rayon.design
work.summary: Rayon.design is an app to craft floor plan with precision
highlights: Developed and iterated on the team management part of the app
Added several key features to the floor plan editor
Designed the state machine responsible for syncing the floor plan with our database as the user draws

work.name: Yahoo
highlights: Carfted a customizable 3d / AR web viewer embedded in news article with huge traffic, featuring a scripting language to create various interactive experiences
Web based editor to allow author to craft 3d / AR experiences for the viewer
Scroll based interactive experiences mixing 3d and video
work.summary: Worked on several web project ( AR / 3d … ) aiming to offer interactive experiences in new articles

work.name: Accountable.eu
work.summary: Accountable allows you to do your accounting from your phone. With access to your bank account and receipt OCR, reconciliation is fully automated
highlights: Designed and implemented a service to reliably interface with various bank account API
Prototyped a desktop version of the app
Set up tools and practices to improve code quality and reliability ( CI / CD, typing, linting, integration testing )

work.name: Dunelm.com
highlights: Participated to architecture decision, re-thinking the website with cutting edge technologies. With a big emphasis on SEO
Set up a reliable deployment pipeline
Conducted workshop and presentation to share the knowledge across an international team
work.summary: Worked on the customer browsing experience of a big e-commerce website

work.name: Arthur Brongniart corp.
work.summary: I worked as a freelancer on short term projects ( 1 to 2 months )

work.name: MyMushin.com
highlights: Implemented a drawing canvas with rich interactions (drag-n-drop, resizing, smart cropping, snapping to a grid, and so on)
Solved image generation issues on client-side (especially regarding image downsizing quality)
Worked remotely on a flexible-yet-intensive schedule

work.name: Tracktl.com
highlights: Wrote services to handled high volume of live update
Interfaced with various music providers (youtube, deezer, soundcloud, …)
Set up a reliable deployment pipeline
work.summary: Tracktl is a social jukebox app. I worked as tech lead in this lovely Parisian startup

work.name: Hola.org
work.summary: Hola provide a browser extension to play video over p2p network. I worked on this extension, and on the landing page.

work.name: Wanadev.fr
highlights: Implemented new 3d elements
Wrote a furniture 3d configurator
Contributed to the public API doc and examples
work.summary: Wanadev edit a web app for home planning. It use WebGL to offer a rich 3d experience.

projects.name: Vernissage
projects.summary: A VR game in a minimalist museum. Made for the js13kgames.com competition.

projects.name: Jurassic Nursery
projects.summary: A game to pet and feed adorable triceratops. Made for the js13kgames.com competition.

projects.name: Timezone.rock
projects.summary: Visualize different timezones around the globe. Helps to plan meeting where everyone is awake.

projects.name: yAR-htzee
projects.summary: A pretty cool yahtzee game in augmented reality
